summary: This adds a Large Home between Riverwood and Whiterun for the player to live in. It has all the amenities one would expect, plus a few hidden ones,  and a great view of Whiterun below.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Valley View Home to Skyrim. Located between Riverwood and Whiterun, this home has the following features:

-Living Area with fireplace

-kitchen with cooking spit and storage for ingredients

-dining area

-Big Display room with many weapon racks and mannequins, as well as an entrance to a hidden room with lots of storage.

-Lounging Area surrounded by a pool of water

-two twin sized beds

-Master bedroom

-study with a hidden entrance to the treasure hunters room

-back porch features a breathtaking view of Whiterun, and has all of the crafting stations

-archery range at the side of the house

To install just unzip to your Skyrim/data folder and you are all set. Please leave comments if you enjoy the mod or if you come across any problems. I plan on adding more in the near future. enjoy.

PS: be sure to check out the screenshots




`
author: leemcky
